alert.note: Alert for Cherokee (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued April 06 at 7:21PM EDT until April 06 at 10:00PM EDT by NWS Knoxville
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 103 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 10 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN NORTH CAROLINA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 1 COUNTY IN SOUTHWEST NORTH CAROLINA CHEROKEE IN TENNESSEE THIS WATCH INCLUDES 13 COUNTIES IN EAST TENNESSEE BLOUNT BRADLEY GRAINGER HAMBLEN HANCOCK HAWKINS JEFFERSON KNOX LOUDON MCMINN MONROE POLK SEVIER THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALCOA, ALPHA, ANDREWS, ARCHVILLE, ATHENS, BEAN STATION, BEARDEN, BENTON, BULLET CREEK, CHESTNUT HILL, CLEAR WATER, CLEVELAND, CONASAUGA, DANDRIDGE, DENTVILLE, ELKMONT, ETOWAH, EVANSTON, HAPPY VALLEY, HARRISBURG, HIAWASSE DAM, JEFFERSON CITY, KNOXVILLE, KODAK, KYLES FORD, LAKE FOREST, LENOIR CITY, LOUDON, MADISONVILLE, MARBLE, MARYVILLE, MCMAHAN, MOORESBURG, MORRISTOWN, MURPHY, PARKSVILLE, PIGEON FORGE, RELIANCE, RUSSELLVILLE, SEVIERVILLE, SEYMOUR, SNEEDVILLE, STRAWBERRY PLAINS, SWEETWATER, TASSO, TOPTON, TREADWAY, UNAKA, VIOLET, AND WHITE PINE.
